name: Squad Tactics
summary: You are adept at working with your allies to surround a foe.
description:
You are adept at working with your allies to surround a foe. If an enemy is within reach of you and at least two of your allies, that enemy is flat-footed against you.Traits

Hobgoblin: Hobgoblins are a sturdy, clever people with a propensity for militaristic order
